name: High Spectral Amplifier
desc: <tooltip created in the script due to sections>
short: Reduces beam range; beams deal more damage and apply hard flux to shields.
sModDesc: Increases beam weapon damage by an additional %s.

name: Auxiliary Ablative Armor
desc:
Technically a complete and utter downgrade, this replaces normal "spaced" armor on the ship with ablative ferroceramic bricks seen on ancient dreadnoughts.

Increases armor value by %s. The effective armor strength for the damage reduction calculation is unchanged.
